name: The Different Trenches
description:
You play as a British during the battle of the Somme in World War 1.  It's your first day of combat, and unlike other sectors your division is doing well. Unfortunately, early into your military service during an attack on your trench you were gunned down by enemy fire. This game shows the opposites of the 2 sides.
